name: Blast the Box: Move the Dragon
description:
A big exploring expedition has taken place on a mystic island, hidden from permanent storms. Two animals, so far unknown to the human race have been caught and imprisoned on the island, to become the biggest attraction of the 21 century. These two animals have been put in to boxes and loaded on a ship directed towards civilization. One species is a tender big eyed animal called “rorrpi” and the other species is a little bad tempered dragon called “dwarf dragon”.
The problem is that the explorers decided to put the animals on the same ship, not knowing that the two species are sworn enemies since immemorial time.
The proud dwarf dragons sensing the presence of the rorrpies will try to escape during the whole trip, in order to hunt down the scared rorrpies.
Your task is to save the rorrpies by blowing up the brown wooden boxes and planks that separate the two beasts from each other, in order to make the dragons fall into the water.
It will not be an easy task, as you have to pay attention that you do not throw the wrong boxes overboard by mistake.
This game is a challenging physics based game and each level requires skills and big logic to be solved.
Choose your moves carefully to get on with the levels and pay attention to the wooden planks between the boxes.

Train your brain and increase your IQ in this free puzzle game.

Features:
★ Addicting mini puzzles
★ High quality 3D graphics
★ Sweet characters
★ Different cool animations
★ Realistic physics
★ A lot of challenging levels
★ Simple but addictive game play


Advise: You cannot blow up the red and green boxes.

A new amazing physics puzzle game hit the market for your entertainment!

name: 3D Tank driver parking War
description:
3D Tank driver parking war is a 3D tank driver game, that will prepare future tank hero’s with their task. All tank riders need to know before hitting the battlefield how they can control their tanks and how they can drive and park this massive army vehicle on the battlefield! To give you the training you need as a soldier that will become a tank hero. We have made this 3D tank parking game, in this 3D tank parking game you learn how to drive a Tank Recon vehicle but also the heavier stuff like an really battle tank. So you know how to control your big or smaller tank when you get into a Tank Battle.

A tank is not a racing vehicle and a lot bigger to park safely then car, buses, or trucks. Don’t expect 3D city parking situations. But more parking situations that will train you to become the greatest tank driver in the world. This tank war game has over 20 parking missions that you need to complete successfully, the quicker you are the higher the reward. You can earn up to three medals for completing your 3D parking mission successful.

Controlling your battle tank successfully is winning half the battle already. In every tank war the best tank drivers are the ones that get back undamaged. And that are the tank drivers the army is looking for in this game . To control your tank you have all the tank driving instruments you will need to earn your medals. Use the steering wheel to drive to the right parking spot, use the gearshift to change the gear backwards and forwards. You can take a look from inside the tank to see if you have manoeuvre the tank successfully into the parking space. As a tank driver you need to make advanced manoeuvres in this cool new 3D tank driver parking war game. Make sure you have park your tank in time because every mission is a race against the clock. No pressure at all for a real soldier!

3D Parking game Features:

- Four different military tanks to drive in, from the recon tank to the big battle tanks
- 20 different parking missions, yes missions not levels clear them all and try to get three stars!
- Real life war parking situations
- Realistic Controls
- Great dynamic gameplay
- Extreme precision tank driving simulator
- Park according the arrow in the parking spot for your war vehicle
- Every mission is a race against the clock, hurry up and park in time
- New tank driver parking missions will follow
- New tanks will be added to this game in the future


In world war two a great deal of the war was a tank war. But in modern warfare a tank driver needs to know what way he can best use his tank. You think you have what it takes to complete this army tank driving game. And are you up for a real 3D tank driving experience, then you will enjoy this new android tank driver game for sure. We hope you will like this game and please give use some support by rating our game or by liking our Facebook page or follow us on twitter!.

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/VascoGames
Twitter - https://twitter.com/VascoGames

name: Pro Darts 2014
description:
Following the worldwide successes of Pro Snooker, Pro Pool and our other sports games iWare Designs brings you Pro Darts 2014; one of the most feature packed and playable darts games available for mobile devices.

With fully textured 3D game environments, specialist custom boards for standard and more obscure game types, and millions of possible dart component combinations, Pro Darts 2014 is the complete package for both casual and serious gamers.

The simple 'swipe to throw' interface combined with an innovative adjustable 'player assist' system allows everyone from novices to pros to pick up and play the game instantly at their own skill level.

Download Pro Darts 2014 now and try it for free, you will not be disappointed.

System Requirements:

∙ Requires Android 2.3 and above.
∙ Requires OpenGL ES version 2 or higher.
∙ Auto configures to all screen resolutions and densities.

Game Features:

∙ Localized to English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, American English, Canadian English, Canadian French and Mexican Spanish.
∙ Full High Def 3D textured environments.
∙ Practice: Fine tune your game by playing on your own.
∙ Quick Play: Play a custom match against a friend, family member or computer opponent.
∙ League: Participate in league events with 3, 5, 7 or 9 rounds where the highest points total wins.
∙ Tournament: Test your nerves in a 4 round knockout tournament event.
∙ Configure up to 4 unique player profiles.
∙ Each profile holds 5 custom darts, comprehensive stats and progression history.
∙ Custom dart configuration system allows for millions of combinations of barrels, stems, stem colors, flight shapes and textures.
∙ Innovative 'player assist' system to help with getting those tricky doubles and trebles.
∙ 3 levels of Oche (throw line) camera to suit all playing styles.
∙ User controlled Orbit Camera and Snapshot system allows you to save close up images of your dart grouping.
∙ Ranking system from Rookie to Legend.
∙ 28 computer opponents with customizable names. Play against the pros!
∙ Over 10 unique dart boards including 'American', 'Par Darts', 'Hi Score', 'Quadro', 'Mini', 'Snooker', 'Yorkshire', 'Fives' and 'Target' boards, each with multiple color options.
∙ Play 301, 401, 501, 601, 701 and 1001 games on many of the custom boards.
∙ Play 'Round the Clock' including special 'doubles' and 'trebles' only variations.
∙ Play 'Snooker' darts on three custom boards and standard boards.
∙ Play 'Par Darts' (Golf) on three custom boards.
∙ Play 305, 405, 505, 605, 705 or 1005 'Fives' games on either the London 'narrow' fives board or the Ipswich 'wide' fives board.
∙ Complete control over the numbers of Sets and Legs per match.
∙ Multiplayer game modes including 'pass and play'.
∙ Over 25 achievements to collect locally.
∙ Track your game progress and achievement progress locally in the new 3D Trophy Room.

description:

Tags: Hidden Object, the best match of the game, find the item, a lot of levels, puzzles, music, beautiful pictures.

Instructions:
Drag the image with the finger to explore the location.
You have to find five objects hidden in the picture, and then you get a prize.
Next to each level has a number of icons to the right of prizes for the opening of this level.
Prizes are available for the passage of certain locations in the game.
For each level will be given to one of the fifteen different prizes.
If you are missing any prizes just unravel once again the level of which is given the desired item.
If the item is very difficult to find, use the hint button.
After using the hint button need some time to restore it, so use it wisely.

A brilliant twist on the old classic - unpack tetromino blocks instead of the usual packing. Tap on the mesmerizing grid to unpack tetrominos and watch them spin, rotate and fall. Clear the lines from the beautiful cloudy grid fast enough - or it's dream over.


Features:


• ENJOY the beautiful ever-changing visuals!
• UNPACK lines in this brilliant twist on the falling blocks classic!
• PLAY 5 modes: Classic, Puzzle, Pro, Nightmare and Shattered Dream!
• RELAX in Zen Puzzle mode - slow down and think about it!
• LISTEN to the amazing music, matching the visual experience perfectly!


Game modes:


* Classic - the original endless unpacking game
* Puzzle - more than 50 puzzles, no descending grid, no time limits, just thinking
* Pro - Classic, but starting at level 9 - faster with more points per line
* Nightmare - starts with floating blocks, clear them all up as quick as you can to win
* Shattered Dream - Classic with randomly placed holes in the grid

name: Hot Girls Slot Machine Pokies
description:
Subject matter aside, this is an addictive slot machine (pokies game) with some nice graphics which is remarkably faithful to the urban design.

The ability to unlock extra bonus features the longer you play means that thiese pokies has plenty of replay potential.

If you like looking at half-naked girls while playing slot machine then that’s a bonus too.

Of course, the slot machine is a byword for elegance, sensuality and beauty.
The pokie reflects this cleverly using a simple but eye-catching black and red and with beautifully realised graphics that are colourful and vivid, it certainly scores well on the elegant feel.

While the sensuality is there, it is very much understated and is not in your face. As such, it enhances the feel of the slot machine and allows the user to focus on playing the game, rather than being distracted by titillation.

It is sexy, sensual and luxurious yes, but it also is most importantly, a very enjoyable and addictive 5-reel pokie with plenty of Wilds and Scatter features to keep beginner and more experienced players playing and focused on what they need to be in order to maximise their chances of winning.


There’s very little not to like about this slot machine; some great graphics, an easy to trigger bonus feature and some dramatic background music and sound effects make the pokie a top-notch gaming experience.

name: Gladiator Slot Machines Pokies
description:
Before it lost it's glory, Rome was known across the world for many things, one of them being epic warriors called gladiators. These warriors battled with strength, wit, skill, and agility inside coliseums, battling either for death or the roar of the crowds. The winners were always the bravest and strongest, and they earned an entire nation's adoration and unimaginable wealth.

If you are a visual person, Gladiator Slot Machines will blow you away - it keeps your heart racing with its brilliant graphics and sounds that will transport you right into The Colosseum in Rome.
Well, not literally, but you get the picture.

You’ll notice that pokies spin button has revolving arrows on it. This means you can start or stop the reels whenever you want; known as skill stop. If you’ve got quick reactions this is particularly useful, if not then just let slot machines reels stop on their own.

You can also use pokies auto play which initially presents 10, 25, 50 or 75 spins. You can also select slot machines advance options to tell the pokies what and when to stop for.

The Slot Machines Wild symbol is able to replace any other icon except the scatter when it appears on screen. These wilds are sticky too and during free spins you'll get a head start with one on the middle pokies reel. This means they literally stick around when the feature is in progress, or during multiple spins if part of a winning line during regular games.

The Slot Machines Scatter will award 5, 10 or 15 free spins when three, four or five icons appear respectively. As mentioned above these free spins will benefit from an additional starting sticky wild, plus all sticky wilds remain on screen until the feature comes to an end. This means plenty more winning chances, plus the pokies spins are totally free.

name: Hidden Object Halloween House
description:
Every house has its secrets - and sometimes these secrets are actual ghosts!

This wonderful hidden object game gives you the unique opportunity to find amazing life-like items in different rooms of a haunted house. Each scene is haunted by ghosts, which make you search for witch-themed objects and sometimes even make them vanish in their shenanigans!

What we give you, are three difficulty levels:
- CASUAL - No time limit and quick hint. All modes available for each unlocked level!
- NORMAL - Time limit and slower hint. Each use of hint costs 2 seconds. Only those modes you've played in the previous level are available in the next one.
- EXPERT - Bonus mode for those who got all stars on all levels in either CASUAL or NORMAL mode.

Each scene can be completed in three search modes:
- By PICTURE - with disappearing objects
- By WORD - with item frenzy or word-scramble
- By SILHOUETTE - with disappearing objects

Complete each of them on the scene to get three stars! Go back to previous levels to get a better score and unlock the next section!

Features:

- clever fun to solve hidden object scenes
- item search by word or by pictures and by silhouette
- inspiring artwork in realistic locations
- difficulty levels and unlockable content

name: Candy Mania
description:
Candy Mania,Your main goal is to pass the levels and try to get all Stars for each level.
How to play:
1. Match 3 or more identical Candy to eliminate them!
2. Match the Candy until the board transparency,the Candy star will appear.
3. Make the Candy Mania down to last line to pass the level.
Tips: Eliminate the Candy quickly can get extra scores.
Game Features:
1. More than 350 levels and 8 pretty scenes in the game, including starry sky,mountains,snow world and so on.
2. Match 4 Candy can win the Candy bomb and 1 lighting.
3. Match 5 Candy can win color-changing Candy and 2 lightings.
4. Eliminate 20 Candy continuous can win 1 lighting.
5. The Candy bomb can eliminate the Candy around.
6. The Color-changing Candy can eliminate to any other colored Candy.
7. The Timing Candy can extend the playing time.
8. The lightning Candy can eliminate Candy in one row.
9. For the chained Candy, you can eliminate the Candy around to unlock it.
10. For the frozen Candy, you can eliminate the Candy around to release it.

name: Emergency Landing Disaster
description:
Mayday Mayday! Prepare for trouble in the turbulent skies of Emergency Landing Disaster. Featuring realistic flight simulation for mobile.

Come rain or shine, these airliners are crashing. Hard. Can you land safely? No?! Well let's see how many pieces you can get to the airport. I'm sure it will be fine!

Ok... So it wasn't fine. But hey, with free missions and the biggest airplanes in the sky, who isn't going to enjoy Emergency Landing Disaster? I would imagine the passengers. We forgot about them again.

HOW TO PLAY:
Tilt the device to control your aircraft! Or, switch to touch screen and tap, drag, and hold anywhere on screen to control the aircraft just like a flight yolk. Switch between controls in the Option or Pause menu for acceleration or touch based controls. Buttons onscreen control the: flaps, gears, airbrakes, and throttle. The goal is to land your airline as safely as possible. The suggested virtual flight path for a smooth landing is shown in green checkpoints, but a safe, smooth landing is your only priority!

FEATURES:
* Flight simulator with realistic aerofoil and control surfaces. You wont believe the flight realism!
* Realistic flight models! A physics based flight simulator made by pilots for pilots.
* Both touch screen controls and tilt controls allow you to play the way you like.
* 4 free harrowing landing scenarios. More coming soon at NO COST!
* All content is FREE, no paid upgrades or in game purchases to slow you down.
* Intense 3D graphics and NVIDIA PhysX ready to put you into the skies! Powered by Unity Pro & UnityFS.

Tips:
*For perfect landings, you want to stall onto your back wheels. Bring the plane up to the runway and drop the throttle while slightly pulling back on the yolk(swipe and hold in the down direction). This will allow the aircraft to softly settle down on her rear wheels.

*Don't forget your surfaces! The Flaps and Air brake can be crucial in taking control at low air speeds. Additional lift and drag can do wonders when attempting to land smoothly and safely.

Remember. Anybody can just land a plane. But it takes a pilot to crash in style!...Wait, that cant be right.

*Follow on Twitter - https://twitter.com/@DMTSource

description:

name: deer 2013 hunter
description:
Welcome to Android deer 2013 hunter!
There are five common methods of hunting. The first method is stand hunting. This is generally the most common method, depending on the terrain. This is done by waiting where deer are likely to travel. Stand hunting is commonly done in an elevated tree stand, but it can be done in a blind on the ground. Tree stands are usually placed 8 to 30 feet above the ground. The stands are made of metal or wood. Stands are often placed at the edge of fields of crops such as corn, wheat, buckwheat, alfalfa, clover, soybeans, cotton and many others. Often, hunters plant crops in strategic locations solely for the purpose of attracting deer. This is known as a food plot. Stands are also placed in the woods on the edge of trails that the deer travel on. Some states allow bait to be placed near these stands to attract the deer. This is different than planting a crop. The most common bait is corn.

There are 3 Games!
Game 1-Memory Game. Unfold the block to match similar picture
Game 2-Puzzle Game. Swift each block to the correct place!.
Game 3-Block Game. Change the block to fit each other.
Once you have completed each levels, you will love this game very much.

Tip on Scoring:
---------------
The more block you clear, the more score you will get.

Other features:
---------------
You can pause the game and resume later.

name: Wuzzit Trouble
description:
The Wuzzits need your help! In Wuzzit Trouble, your job is to free the lovable Wuzzits from the traps they’ve inadvertently wandered into inside the castle. Use your puzzle-solving skills to unlock the Wuzzits’ cages by gathering keys. Along the way you can also give the Wuzzits treats and collect special items from each of the rooms you explore. But take care to avoid dangerous hazards in your path!

Wuzzit Trouble, in addition to being a fun game for everyone to play, also helps develop mathematical conceptual thinking skills. Unlike so many math games that focus on basic computational skills, Wuzzit Trouble aims to help players increase their critical 21st century mathematics competencies.

The game is built around the important mathematical concept of integer partitions – the expression of a whole number as a sum of other whole numbers. At the easiest levels of the puzzle, these provide engaging practice in basic arithmetic, leading to arithmetical fluency, but that’s just the start. Integer partitions is a major area of mathematics, still being worked on today by leading mathematicians. Though freeing the Wuzzits won’t take you into those dizzy realms, as you move up through the levels you will face challenges that increasingly require higher-order arithmetical thinking, algebraic thinking, strategy design and modification, and algorithm design, all crucial abilities in today’s world. With not a paper and pencil in sight, every time you attempt to maximize your score as you free a Wuzzit, you will be developing and applying valuable conceptual, analytic thinking skills that sharpen your mind.

Key Features:
*Fun for everyone in the family to play
*Designed to develop mathematical conceptual thinking skills relevant to success in the 21st century
*75 different puzzles and three different star ratings per puzzle
*Innovative gear-based gameplay
*Lovable new characters
*Beautiful graphics
*Special collectibles to store in your Trophy Room
*No third-party advertising
*No in-app purchases

We take online safety and privacy very seriously. Please review our Terms of Use at http://www.innertubegames.net/TOU and our Privacy Policy at http://www.innertubegames.net/privacy.

Learn more at www.innertubegames.net !

name: 렛츠피싱 for Kakao
description:
## 전국민 바다 이야기 렛츠피싱!! 시원한 낚시의 세계로 풍덩!!! ##

눈이 즐거운 수족관, 살아 있는 파이팅, 친구들과 함께 즐기는 대물 출현 시스템!
당신이 원하는 모바일 낚시 게임의 모든 것!
손만 대면 월척이 뜬다! 전국민 바다 이야기, 렛츠피싱!
렛츠피싱에서만 느낄 수 있는 짜릿한 스릴감! 지금 바로 만나보세요~

▶▷ 렛츠피싱 런칭 기념 초호화 이벤트 ◁◀

전국민 바다이아기 렛츠피싱, 스페셜 오픈 이벤트!

[오픈기념 이벤트] 실제 낚시의 짜릿한 재미까지, 렛츠피싱이 폭풍 지원!
게임아이템은 기본! 낚시 지원금, 캠핑 지원금!! 시원~하게 팍팍 쏩니다.
오늘 이곳은 물 반 경품 반, 물 좋~은 낚시터!!

▶ 하나! 낚시만 해도 보물이 쏟아진다!
게임 중 이벤트 아이템을 낚으면 낚시 지원금과 기프티콘이 와르르!

▶ 둘! 묻지마 레벨업! 레벨업 할수록 경품도 UpUp!
미션 레벨을 달성하면 각종 게임 아이템은 기본!
실제 고급 낚시 장비를 살 수 있는 지원금이 무려 100만원!

▶ 셋! 진격의 대물! 대물잡고 캠핑 고고씽!!
대물 중의 대물, 날뛰는 환도상어 캐스팅 성공 시 행운 뽑기 티켓 100% 지급!
대물출현 플레이 판 수에 따라 골드, 다이아에, 캠핑 지원금 50만원까지!

▶ 넷! 렛츠피싱으로 친구와 수어지교!
친구 초대 시 마다 각종 행운 티켓과 다이아가 팡팡!
30명을 초대하면 펫 ‘방울드래곤’ 100% 지급!

* 경품은 대상자 중 추첨을 통해 지급됩니다.
* 자세한 사항은 렛츠피싱 홈페이지를 참고하세요.

▶▷ 렛츠피싱의 특징 ◁◀

▶ 터치터치 짜릿한 손맛!! 터치로 잡는 재미진 낚시!!!
입수 난이도에 따라 다양한 패턴과 속도로 움직이는 물고기를 잡아라!!
커졌다~ 작아졌다~ 동서남북으로 움직이는 터치 존에서 물고기를 사정없이 타격해 보아요!
리듬액션 뺨 치는~ 재미진 낚시, 궁금하다면 지금 바로 접속!

▶ 단언컨대, 엄청 큰 대!물!등!장!
하나 보단 둘, 둘보단 셋! 모두모두 뭉쳐라!!
모바일 강태공들을 도발 시키는 포악하고 사나운 대물 등장!!!
혼자라서 힘들어요~ 그렇다면! 친구들과의 협공으로 대물을 잡아보아요!

▶ 이곳은 바다? 강? 아님 물속? 살아 움직이는 물고들!
살아 움직이는 듯한 화려한 3D 그래픽! 사실적인 물고기들에 놀라셨다구요?
도다리, 전어, 참돔에 우리에게 익숙한 니모 물고기 ‘아네모네’ 까지!!
살아 움직이는 듯한 물고기의 모션에 이곳이 바다인지, 강인지 착각할 수도 있어요!

▶ 더 이상 집안에 어항은 사치입니다. 나만의 Unique 수족관!!
실제 바다 지형을 닮은 바다빛 수족관부터, 유적지, 그리고 난파선 수족관까지!
이것만 있으면 섭섭하죠. 내 수족관은 메인 화면과 연동이 된다는 점~~~
나의 물고기가 가득한 나만의 수족관 지금 당장 구경해봐요!!

▶ 나의 왼쪽 손을 걸지! 운을 시험해 볼 럭키 룰렛!
오~ 이런! 골드가 우르르 쏟아지는 행운의 럭키 룰렛!!
친구야 고맙다! 친구를 초대하면 돌아가는 친구 초대 우정 룰렛!!
오늘 나의 운을 한 번 시험해 볼까요?

name: 캐슬 크래시 : Castle Clash
description:
모두가 기다린 전략 아케이드 게임! “캐슬 크래시”를 통해 영주가 되어보세요!
나만의 영웅과 군대를 지휘하고 영토를 확장시켜, 당신만을 위한 화려한 제국을 건설해 보세요!

“캐슬 크래시”의 가장 큰 특징은 바로 빠른 전쟁입니다.
화려한 전쟁화면과 정령과 난쟁이, 수인, 거대한 기계 생물로 구성된 군대, 그리고 영웅과 강력한 마법을 사용해서 상대방의 자원을 빼앗고 도시를 정복할 수 있습니다!!

게임 특징:
- 다양한 업그레이드를 통해 보다 막강한 도시를 건설할 수 있습니다!

- 강력한 영웅 양성을 통해 나만의 전설을 만들어 나갈수 있습니다.
- 공격진영과 수비진영의 생생한 전쟁 화면!
- 전쟁터에서 다른 게이머와 겨루어 ‘최강 영주’라는 호칭을 쟁탈해 보세요!
- 다양하고 화려한 마법을 사용하여 장애물을 제거해 보세요!
- 어디에도 없는 화려한 전쟁화면!
- 무료 플레이가 가능합니다!

name: 타이니팡2 for Kakao
description:
★☆타이니팡2 업데이트 기념 이벤트! ☆★
☆미션 완료하고 스페셜 선물 받자!!☆

미션 완료할 때마다 아이템 선물 100%!!
추첨을 통해 실물 경품까지 팡팡!!

최신형 핸드폰 ‘LG G2’부터 MAC립스틱까지
여러분을 기다리고 있습니다.

자세한 내용은 ‘이벤트 배너’에서 확인해주세요!!

-기간: 10.15~11.11 / 경품 당첨자 발표: 11.14 (컴투스 홈페이지)


★귀여운 동물들과 즐기는 쉽고 재밌는 버블 슈팅, 타이니팡2!★

타이니팡2, 스토리 모드가 추가되어 더욱 새롭고 강력해졌어요!
귀여운 울보 양 ‘벤’과 똑똑한 모험가 햄스터 ‘햄비’가
방울에 갇힌 동물 친구들을 구하러 ‘타이니팡2’에 등장했어요.
더욱 신나고 아찔하게 돌아온 버블슈팅의 최강자, 타이니팡2를 만나보세요!

★새롭고 다양한 스테이지가 가득, ‘스토리’ 모드!★
1. 재미있고 다양한 스테이지 구성과 다채로운 에피소드
동물 구하기 미션부터 마법 항아리에 방울 떨어뜨리기까지~
스테이지마다 재미있는 미션이 가득해요.
차근차근 생각해 보고 방울 하나하나 최선을 다해보세요.
벤과 햄비의 끝없는 모험을 위해 스테이지는 계속 추가될 예정이에요!

2. 국내 버블슈팅 게임 최초, 메시지 기능 구현!
친구야~ 거기까지 어떻게 갔니? 궁금하면 지도에서 멀리간 친구 사진을 클릭해서 물어보세요.
물론 모험할 때 밥이 되는 도토리를 친구에게 요청할 때 써도 좋겠죠!

3. 벤과 햄비의 모험을 도와주는 다양한 아이템
반사각, 폭탄, 5회 더 던지기 등 아이템을 전략적으로 사용해서 친구보다 빨리 새로운 스테이지를 만나보세요.

★신나고 아찔한 버블슈팅의 쾌감, ‘오리지널’ 모드!★
1. 총 3가지의 다양한 게임 방식
도전!60 – 60초 안에 많은 통통 튀는 방울을 터트려 주세요. 화면 내 배수방울을 공략하면, 높은 점수를 획득할 수 있어요.
릴레이팡 - 시간은 짹깍짹깍 심장은 쫄깃쫄깃, 어서 시간방울을 공략해서 최대한 많은 점수를 내 보자구요.

2. 동물 친구들과 함께 던져보세요!
'하하하, 더 이상 혼자가 아니에요!'
새침하고 통통하지만 때론 주변을 놀라게 하는 펭귄 친구,
듬직하고 순하지만 가끔 무섭게 화가 나는 곰 친구,

동물 친구들은 동물 뽑기를 통해 만나볼 수 있어요!

친구에게 격려의 하트도 보내고, 잠깐 자는 양이 있다면 좀 깨워주세요. 물론, 친구초대도 된답니다. 100점을 모으면, 공짜로 풍성한 아이템이 짜자잔! 이번 주도 일등에 도전해 보세요.

4. 다양하고 강력한 아이템!
각 모드 별로 구성된 총 20종의 다양한 아이템을 써보세요. 물론, 아이템 파워업을 통해 더욱 강력한 아이템으로 바꿀 수 있어요.

name: Baby Nurse - Kid Hospital FREE
description:

Baby Care - Meet the babies basic care and needs, and feed them a bottle of milk, change their diaper, and give them a pacifier when done. Baby will let you know if he/she is hungry, or needs a diaper change, so be quick!

name: Badminton Smash 3D
description:
Realistic Physics, Beautiful 3D Graphics and a Fast Pace of Real Badminton make this the Best Badminton Game for Mobile. Swipe your finger to Drive, Drop or Smash the ball in the direction you want, it feels like Real Badminton!

- Fast Paced feeling of Real Badminton
- Realistic Physics
- Intuitive One Finger Controls
- 16 different opponents
- Career Mode
- Shop

Enjoy!

How To Play:

Swipe your finger to hit the Badminton shuttlecock. Timing is critical in this Badminton Game: the better you time your shots, faster and more precise the Badminton shots will be. Badminton ball flies in the direction of your swipe. The more horizontal shots will land closer to the net, while the vertical shots will fly further away from the net. Varying the distance of Badminton shots is a powerful tactics in this Badminton Game.

The player moves automatically towards the shuttlecock, when his position is good it can jump to Smash the Badminton ball. Badminton Smash is a particularly effective shot that can reach the most speed. Use other shots like drop and drive with varying directions to force your opponent to make a mistake and set yourself up for a Smash Badminton shot.

You can buy upgrades in the Sports Shop that can increase your players Badminton Skills. Shoes increase your players speed and jump height. And Rackets increase shoot speed and decrease the penalty for bad timing. Your Badminton Game gets faster and faster as you buy more upgrades.

You play against opponents for different countries situated on a 3D Earth Globe. Victory against each opponent is enough to pass the stage. But score difference gets you more stars for each level. Concept of memory game

Memory game can also be referred as concentration game, which helps one to improve their memory by concentrating and focusing. Such games help one to improve their memory and are scientifically proven to be productive. Playing memory games can be just perfect for the kids as they help improve the brain power. It is been said that humans use only a couple of thousands of neurons within their brain in their whole lifetime. But while playing a memory game one may be able to use up to billions or even trillions of such neurons.

Benefits of playing memory games for kids

As mentioned before, playing memory games can be really helpful. There can work wonders to one's brain and increase their brain power. Few of the benefits of playing memory games include:

- Memory games actually provide a healthy exercise to your child's brain. Hence it is advisable that the child gets these exercises at an early age.
- Memory games are known to increase the concentration power of your brain within no time if played regularly.
- Memory games improve brain power of your kids.
- Memory games keep your child's brain active all the time.
- Thus a child who plays memory games regularly may actually stay away from diseases like Alzheimer's or even amnesia as there memory is enhanced and the hormone secretion is balanced with growth of new neurons.
- Memory games provide a positive effect on a child's mind.
- Memory games are totally safe, healthy and free from violence unlike other games which leave parents worried.
- Memory games are been specifically designed to work wonders on your child's mind and brain.
- Memory games are designed for children specifically in the age group of 3 to 18 years.
- Memory games boost up your child's brain functionality and overall enhances their reasoning and cognitive skills.
- Memory games may help your child to improve his academic performances.

Bubble shooter: Halloween is extremely addictive, while offering great features like the “swap” button and the cross-hair for fun and spooky gameplay!

name: Mini Lemmings
description:
The game is a faithful reproduction of the legendary PC puzzle game Lemmings, where over a series of levels you have to help the lemmings reach their destination.
->Allows the user to zoom in or out by moving two fingers farther apart or closer together while touching the display.

Help:
Lemmings will fall through a trap door into each level. Your job is to get them safely to the exit by using the Lemming skills at the bottom of the play window. Simply click on a skill icon to use that skill. Some levels stretch beyond the limits of the window, so there will be scroll bars in those circumstances.
(Touch gestures: zoom the screen with your two fingers - Pinch out to zoom in)

name: Penguin Skiing
description:
Now our old friend and his fellows come to compete against each other by skiing.
After three adventures under the scorching sun the monster and his friends yearn for colder climes. So the monster swaps his surfboard for a snowboard and heads for a winter-wonderland in the austrian alps. The little cute friends, back in their element, go crazy, forget completely about flying and throw themselves down the snowy slopes with the monster.
Scores are built from a combination of what position you end in and the amount and type of tricks you managed to do along the way.
There are 10 cute animals racing against the monster. Hit them to get points. This will knock the them out for a short moment, but make him angry. So they will be faster after that.
You will get extra points for final race postition.
READY? LET'S GO!!!

SCORE BOARD SUPPORTED! SUBMIT YOUR SCORE TO COMPETE WITH OTHER USERS AROUND THE WORLD!
HOW TO PLAY

TAP the left half screen to turn left
TAP the right half screen to turn right

name: Trivia Crack
description:
★★★ FROM THE CREATORS OF AWORDED ★★★

From the creators of Aworded arrives Trivia Crack, the amazing quiz game that lets you test your knowledge and challenge your friends to see who is the smartest!

Trivia Crack is a trivia game with six different categories: geography, history, art & literature, science and technology, entertainment, and sports. You'll have to collect the characters that correspond to each one of the categories. Spin the wheel and chance will decide which category you will have to answer. If the wheel stops at the special slot, you'll be able to play for a character of your choice!

But knowledge is not enough to win! Trivia Crack is also a game of strategy: you can steal characters from your opponents if you challenge them on a duel! If the wheel stops at the the special slot, you'll be able to choose between playing for a character or challenging your opponent so you can steal one of his. Additionally, Trivia Crack includes four Power-Ups that will help you get the correct answer to the most difficult questions.

Trivia Crack has a bright, lively, sophisticated and intuitive interface, and you'll enjoy incredible animations as you answer the questions!

Trivia Crack is a fast, dynamic and addictive game. There are more than 90.000 questions that will be constantly updated and you can suggest your own! It's available in Spanish for Spain and Latin America, and in English for the United States and United Kingdom. New languages coming soon!

Highlights:

- Test your knowledge
- Combines wit and strategy
- Challenge your friends to a duel
- Chat with your opponents during games
- Share your achievements

Keep up on Trivia Crack:

Visit our website http://www.triviacrack.com and follow us via @triviacrack on Twitter, on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/triviacrack or Google+ at https://plus.google.com/+triviacrack for tips and tricks and other helpful information.

To learn more about how to use Trivia Crack, visit our Support Page: http://triviacrack.com/support

If you are having technical issues or have any questions, we're here to help. Please send us an email to: support@triviacrack.com

name: Off-Road Driving Safari 3D
description:
Looking for some Safari adventure driving? Get behind the wheel in the 4x4 adventure game. Go exploring the off-road in this highly engaging game for kids of all ages.

Done with 3D graphics give you the feeling you are right there on Safari.

Elephants, Rhinos, and Jeep Driving!! What can be better.

The game has 7 levels to provide you with the skill you need to become a full Ranger.

**Bonus Level** - to get to the secret bonus level, simply push the small Bonus Level button. This level will give you a taste of everything the game has to offer. Elephants, Rhinos, obstacles, cones, mines and mountains. Sorry, no zombies yet.

Level 1 - Basic skills 4x4 driving test. This level introduces you to your safari jeep vehicle. The object is to drive your truck through all the cones before the time expires. Be sure and say high to the Elephants.

Level 2- Intermediate 4x4 driving. Make your way through the concrete barriers before the time expires.

Level 3- Live Mine Field - watch out for the Mines as you wind your way around the obstacle course. Be careful - the mines can do some serious damage to your car.

Level 4- Super Advanced Offroad. Make it past this and you are well on your way to becoming a full ranger.

Level 5- Free the Captured Rhinos. Help free 3 Rhinos that have been trapped by poachers. Free all of them before time expires. Now you are a Ranger!!

Level 6- Free the Captures Elephants . Five elephants have been captured by poachers. Free them before time expires.

Level 7 - the BONUS level - everything is here to play around with. There are no objectives. It is just a chance to have fun.

Off-road truck driving with skills training and the change to save a few Rhinos.

This game is the training game for Part 2 in the Off-Road Driving Safari Series. Pass all 6 levels and the Poacher Hunter game will be a breeze.

Great for kids of all ages. Again, sorry no zombies yet.

name: Mega Driver
description:
Get ready for another Games2Win smash hit! Mega Driver! Take control of seven awesome vehicles in one game! Cruise through the city leading a 911 Rescue Team, drive on an airstrip in a shuttle bus or drop the tiny tots to school, experience the ultimate driving action, right here!
What’s more, some cool trophies await you at the end of each chapter. Add to that the exciting time-based gameplay that gets tougher with each passing level. It’s not a test of your driving skills, but a test of how well can you juggle multiple roles as you live seven different avatars in this one power-packed game.
And no matter what duty you are assigned, the basics still remains the same. Drive smooth, steer carefully and keep an eye on the clock!
So, what are you waiting for…get ready to shift gears as well as some avatars in this one awesome car game!

Mega Driver Features:

100+ Awesome Levels
7 vehicles in one game
Exciting time-based gameplay
Win shiny trophies

VISIT US: http://games2win.com

name: Scontro di Regni: Castle Clash
description:
Conquista i territori, costruisci il tuo impero e dai vita a imprese straordinarie con Castle Clash, il miglior gioco di strategia di sempre! Recluta gli Eroi più potenti e diventa così Signore della Guerra. In un mix di abile strategia e combattimento, le truppe di attacco e difesa si scontrano in un gioco di proporzioni epiche. Crea il tuo esercito di elfi, nani, bestie, robot e molto di più per conquistare città, saccheggiarle e sconfiggere i nemici! La tua abilità è la forza del tuo impero!
Caratteristiche del gioco:
-Costruisci e migliora la tua città per renderla una fortezza impenetrabile!
-Semplice modalità di gioco: basta premere i tasti di controllo!
-Crea l'esercito più forte! Dopo le prime battaglie di allenamento i guerrieri saranno al tuo servizio in tutta la loro potenza.
-Battaglie realistiche ed emozionanti!
-Combatti contro gli Eroi degli altri giocatori dell'arena per vincere il titolo di Signore della Guerra!
-Una sorprendente potenza magica si libererà col solo tocco dei tasti di controllo e neutralizzerà tutti gli ostacoli!
-Fantastici effetti appariranno sul tuo schermo!
-Il gioco è GRATIS!

name: Airport 3D Jet plane parking
description:
Airport 3D Jet airplane parking

A new parking game challenge. Airport 3D jet airplane parking is a super cool 3D car parking game look alike, normal parking games are full of driving and parking vehicles like cars, trucks, buses and more. But this time instead of a steering wheel you need to park a jet airplane, so get into the role of a jet fighter airplane pilot and start parking the airplane somewhere on the airport, airports are crowed with other vehicles you need to watch out for so you don’t damage your jet fighter airplane. And remember parking an airplane is something totally different then parking a simple truck, bus or a car. This 3D parking game will train you as a pilot how to safely park you plane somewhere on the airfield, follow the right directions that you receive from the flight control tower as you drive along 12 levels. Filed with helicopters, planes, safety cars, trucks, towing vehicles or staircase trucks which can create a labyrinth of vehicles to steer your airplane safely through .

As you may know cars, trucks and busses are easier to park if you have mastered how to play this super cool airport parking game. Parking an jet fighter airplane can be a real parking challenge even for the most skilled and experienced driver. So learn how a jet pilot needs to park his airplane safely from the runway to the parking space on the airport. Become the real parking king of the airstrip in this fun and exciting parking game from VascoGames.

The different airport levels are set in 3D-style. In each level you’ll get a other challenge. As you drive your way through the airfield levels the game will get progressively more challenging. If you love to drive a car, truck bus or any other vehicles this free 3D game is fun and awesome to play. Aircraft, planes and other objects will stand in your way from conquering this parking mania game!

We hope you will have fun and will enjoy or newest game Airport 3D airplane parking
. Airport 3D Jet airplane parking is a free to play game!

Game features
- Airport driving missions drive over the airstrip watch out for planes, aircrafts and other airfield obstacles
- 12 different levels each level has its own parking challenge
- Real life parking situations
- Realistic Controls
- Great dynamic gameplay
- Extreme precision driving simulator
- Night time jet parking missions
- Park according to the arrow in the parking place
- More exciting Airport 3D Jet airplane parking levels will follow

We hope you will enjoy this Airport 3D Jet airplane parking game and drive safely. Please give use some support by rating our game or by liking our Facebook page or you can follow us on twitter!.

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/VascoGames
Twitter - https://twitter.com/VascoGames

Animal Hospital is specially designed for kids and other who love to play games.
Here is the chance for you to get your children become a doctor and take care of sick animals in Animal Hospital.

Animal Hospital is ideal for kids age between 2 - 6, that are normally interested in basic medical techniques and body structure.

Enjoy this really extra-ordinary game for kids.
